text: I would vote for Gove. He may be a bit of a shit but he is my kind of shit. If they want competence and someone who can deliver Brexit he is the man. The rest are pygmies

text: We all have to fake it at the start. Knowing your stuff is important but it’s not advocacy

text: Hah
author: jerryhayes1

text: And good luck. It is the best job in the world. Crap pay. But worthwhile and fun. And the most amazing camaraderie. Even in your darkest moments before the most wankerish tribunals never forget that we are privileged to do this job. And fuck ‘em. They have failed.
author: jerryhayes1

text: A few pieces of advice from an old stager. It’s all about confidence. Fake it. Pretend you are in a play. Eventually you will be confident. It is natural to be nervous. It can bring the best out of you. Never be afraid to seek advice. Most barristers really want to help you.
author: jerryhayes1

text: I have just been watching Esther McVey on SKY. I found her really really scary. And she calls herself a Tory. I  feel horror and shame that people like this could be seen as prominent Conservatives. She gleams with hatred and anger. Is this what we have come to?
